text: Like many of his fellows, he began to shiver. The boots of their pursuers rang and resounded on the dry leaves. The omnipotent shackled omnisciences slowed to a halting and halting pace. Until recently, whenever he had fallen into a pit, his salvation had consisted in awakening, but at this stage the pursuers had learned that stratagem and were no longer surprised. However, this time he surprised them again. Just as the shepherds thought he was about to wake up, he, simply, dreamed he was sleeping. FIN Despistes et franquezas, 1990
title: Persecuta
author: Mario Benedetti
